name: A NOT Troll Game
description:
You - Coob, must save the troll world from Zoobtryx. Jump from platform to platform. Sound easy? You are being trolled more and more. From invisible walls to suddenly appearing blocks. But will you manage to defeat Zoobtryx and meet an another "friend"?

This is a jump and run game in Pixel - Low style where you get trolled. You cant trust the world. With 10 levels that doesn't sound like much, you must have a good conscience. Each update new season with new challenges. There is also an endless mode.
